item.description:
After sharing healthy holiday treats, we have the opportunity to learn about a new mind-body method, presented by Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies member, Micki Kuttler.

Please make every effort to join us!

 

The Kinesio Taping Method is designed to facilitate the body's natural healing process while allowing support and stability to muscles and joints, and without restricting the body's range of motion.  Using specially formulated Kinesio Tape, a wide variety of results can be achieved by varying the direction and tension, the shape of the tape, and the position of the body.  The Tape and Method have been seen in use during numerous Olympic Games, marathons, and other sporting events, but a large majority of users are non-athletes.

Micki Kuttler, owner of Boston Bowen (www.bostonbowen.abmp.com), is a Certified Kinesio Taping Practitioner.  She has used the tape with clients, family and herself to reduce pain and facilitate movement in knees, shoulders, hands, backs, legs, feet and more.  She will demonstrate some uses of the tape and describe some of the different ways in which it can be used.Join us to share healthy and festive food and nourishing conversation.

 

Potluck lunch begins at  11:30 am.  Presentation from 12:15 - 1:15 pm

Healthy holiday-oriented food is very welcome.  Healthy and nourishing food is always welcome.

Let us know what you'll bring to the potluck when you RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll welcome you at the door
item.name: December Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup--The Kinesio Taping Method
